author: Sarah R
title: Fab hotel and staff!
text: My boyfriend and I stayed here as a treat for his birthday - I emailed ahead in the hope they might be able to treat us in some way. Shanice who works for the hotel said they would upgrade us but I just assumed they meant one tier up. We arrived and Shanice had arranged a suite for my boyfriend and I - it was amazing! She also phoned to check how we liked the room which was just the nicest touch. Suite was nice and big, bed was extremely comfy too. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would 100% go back.
